name: The Royal Hero
description:
Goal:

Protect the princess from the evil Munchies and Punchies, while keeping an eye open for Slicers that make your job harder by trying to attack you!

Controls:
  • Up arrow key or W to move forward
  • Left and right arrow keys or A and D to rotate left and right
  • Down arrow key or S to look back
  • Left mouse button to attack
  • Press space when the boost bar is full to kill all enemies in the scene
Coming Updates:
  1. Sound effects
  2. Particle effects
  3. Full main menu
  4. Pause screen
  5. More detailed terrain
  6. MUCH MORE!
